text: Christopher Charles Wood (born April 14, 1988) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Kai Parker in the sixth season of the CW's television series The Vampire Diaries in 2014. He also starred in the 2016 CW television series Containment as police officer Jake Riley. From 2016 to 2018, he played Mon-El on the CW superhero series Supergirl. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Ohio
title: Chris Wood (actor)
